short_summary: SPARE PARTS FOR HEAVY CONSTRUCTION MACHINERY
description: SPARE PARTS FOR HEAVY CONSTRUCTION MACHINERY AND EQUIPMENT
full_summary:
# Vehicular Equipment Components Tender Announcement

## Bid Announcement
The Department of National Defence has a requirement to procure vehicular equipment components, as outlined in this tender notice.
 
## Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: cb-332-20633014
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-259707/A
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-23
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-09 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-07-09
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-08-29
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-08-29

## Procurement Details
The procurement is for vehicular equipment components, including:
* O-rings (NSN: 5331-12-141-5099)
* Filter elements (NSN: 2940-12-187-5675)
* Buzzer (NSN: 6350-12-303-7721)
* Other components (NSN: listed below)

Bidder must submit a valid bid to the following email address: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. Electronic submission of bids is the only method accepted.

## Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the price of the submitted proposals. The selection will be based on the lowest price quotation received.

## Important Dates
* Tender closing date: 2024-07-09 14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-08-29

## Contracting Details
The procurement is for the Department of National Defence. The tender notice is available on the Canada Buys website.

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact:
* Hector Vargas via email at [HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca](mailto:HECTOR.VARGAS@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3643

## Documents
The tender documents, including the NIBS and NNO list, are available for download on the Canada Buys website.

## Trade Agreements
Please refer to the tender documents for information on trade agreements related to this procurement.

## Notice URL
The tender notice is available on the Canada Buys website.
